hero.title: San Franciscoâ€™s Calling
hero.lead: Don't miss your chance to experience the vibrant culture and community of San Francisco at this exciting event at Fort Mason. With so much to see and do, it's sure to be a highlight of your time in the city by the bay.

thingsToDo.title: Things to do in San Francisco
thingsToDo.content: Looking for adventure, culture, and excitement in one of America's most iconic cities? Look no further than San Francisco! This vibrant city by the bay is home to a wealth of exciting activities and attractions that are sure to delight visitors of all ages and interests.
